project.name: structural.adapter.classification
project.description:
Goal of the example is to create a Multi Layer Perceptron based classification method that is used for two different datasets. Classifier is provided by Weka.
The following datasets are used during example: https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Bank+Marketing https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Car+Evaluation
Data sets can be found into the resources folders.
You should adapt the Weks's classifier to the needs of the Java application.
